thread.section_title: Dolphin Suites - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Kampala, Uganda) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: no value for money
thread.title_full: no value for money - Review of Dolphin Suites, Kampala, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: marcodubbelt
title: no value for money
text: first of all I understand that all hotels in kampala are overpriced and this is just one of many. People who stayed in different hotels in the world will know that you will get much better hotels for a 100 dollar a night. the rooms of the dolphin suites are small outdated and noisy. breakfast is very limited and service is very slow. The staff didn't get any training but are very friendly. Food is to expensive at the hotel and there are better options in the area. This hotel is a good option if you have to be in kampala because the alternatives are even worse. the location of the hotel is very good. the hotel is clean. 40-50 dollar a night for this hotel would reasonable.
